articles.title: Final farewell? Injured Serena Williams quits Wimbledon in tears - Deccan Herald

articles.title: ‘America’s Got Talent’ auditions continue: How to watch Episode 5 online, without cable - OregonLive

articles.title: Nigeria, others to begin Lassa fever vaccine clinical trials - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: The United States of America has said that a new phase of Lassa fever vaccine clinical trials is set to begin in Nigeria, Liberia and Sierra Leone.
articles.content:
